short_description: The Smokio e-cig employs Wireless Best if you connect with the Operating system or perhaps iOS product. Coming from there the user downloads the particular free of charge software in addition to employs the item for you to observe key data, along with manage some characteristics in the electronic digital smoke itself. By way of example, some sort of end user can alter the quantity of water vapor given down using every single use the e-cig. The request furthermore allows the user for you to observe the particular 900-mAh power supply in the e-cig, which promises seven hours of use in addition to many days and nights of standby time period.
